text: De, Jutatɨle balañjun yetɨk gasak wulu sivɨt pɨiaŋgapale mfa toneve. Kavɨla mfatɨle balañjun kavik toneve, Gasak Wamɨle Gasak Wakundundi* yila avɨtkasundi Gotkɨk Wulu Kumbaŋgikɨk Balañjundi* yila gasak wakundu. De, kavɨla mfatɨle balañju wofopɨn watvɨt vaŋ mfakuŋgumɨ Jisasɨkɨk safutuk mandɨvale wulu sivɨt pɨiyeve. Kapekandi Jisas kɨlɨwɨ ga ŋɨme Pailatɨk* masiveve.
